1.content: Max was 3.5 years old and being only a pup he didn’t really care for the potty so he either wore diapers or pull-ups on most days. He also loves milk and cheese but unfortunately he’s lactose intolerant so it bothers his belly. Today Max was in Daycare doing...
1.title: Max the Husky!

choices: He let out a silent but deadly
He had to poop in his pull-up
A caretaker passed out from his fart
He dug a hole in the ground and pooped in it
14.content: Max was outside at recess. He was in a pull-up up today and happily playing in the sandbox at the back corner of the play ground. He was almost finished with his castle when a familiar bubbling feeling started in his tummy. “Oh! Tummy bubbles!” He said and giggled. He had snuck some cheese before leaving home this morning and it was kicking in his lactose intolerance. He kept playing in the sand, but the bubbles only increases. Soon a pressure was at his but and he couldn’t hold it any more.
14.title: Recess outside

141.content:
Max tried to hold it in by tightening his butt muscles. He could feel the gas escaping a little at a time. It made no sound, but the resulting smell was horrible. Max didn’t mind the smell, but as the wind blew, the smell soon covered the whole play ground. The other kids and the caretakers looked sick. So he wouldn’t be immediately noticed as the one who did it he covered his nose and acted like the others.

Some did look his way, as if they knew, but others fell for it. Once the air cleared the caretakers had a diaper check to see who had done it. Max was next when the pup in front of him was found with a dirty pull-up. Max didn’t know if he was glad or disappointed that he won’t be blamed.
141.title: He let out a silent but deadly

1411.content: The other caretakers call for everyone to come back inside. Max lines up with the other kids. As they file inside he feels more bubbles in his tummy. He smiles to himself. As the caretaker closes the door he announced that it is...
1411.title: Time to go inside

choices: Time ran out, and Max could go play again.
15.content:
Max was sitting on the potty, kicking his husky legs back and forth. His daycare had mandatory "potty visit times" where everyone had to go to the bathroom for 5 minutes.

Eventually...
15.title: In the bathroom

153.content: Max was sitting there bored when finally the timer rang and he hopped off the potty and ran back to the play room, soon after that while max was on the carpet playing with blocks the caretaker was hanging out small snacks, the snacks were
153.title: Time ran out, and Max could go play again.

1532.content: Milk, of course, was dairy, and that meant that Max shouldn't have it. But of course, he loves it.
1532.title: Cookies and milk

15323.content: Max decided to eat the cookies and have the milk with them. The caretaker made the best chocolate chip cookies that all the cubs at the daycare loved, as time went by Max
15323.title: Max has both.

1532331.content: Max stood there as he felt his slightly chubby belly rumble, he found a place where he could be alone in the Daycare away from other kids as he sat down and rubbed his tummy. Max then felt a huge pressure on his butt and he really needed to go potty. Max
1532331.title: ...go to the potty.

choices: Flushing. The flush sound is so scary!
Wiping. Toilet paper is so rough.
15323311.content:
Max sits down on the potty and starts pooping in it. Success!

Now here comes the hard part...
15323311.title: Makes it to the potty

choices: Went to lunch at the daycare
153233112.content: Even though Max didn’t really like using the potty or care for it what he didn’t like even more was wiping himself, he hated the way the toilet paper felt, so Max just hopped off the potty and flushed. Pulling his pull-up back up over his dirty bottom, then Max
153233112.title: Wiping. Toilet paper is so rough.

choices: Max ignores it and keeps eating.
He goes to get it changed.
15323312.content:
"Uh-oh..."

Max poops in his Pull-Up.
15323312.title: Max doesn’t make it

choices: Max has to go potty again from the snack he finished eating
He gets tired and asked for a sleep mat
153233121.content: Max sighed as he let go of the huge pressure that was in his tummy and by his bottom. The smell didn’t bother him though so he kept eating the snack. Soon a care taker comes by and asks is Max had an accident, Max sakes his head yes and then Max is carried away to get changed. After max was changed he then went to go play in the mat again. Soon
153233121.title: Max ignores it and keeps eating.

info.brief_description: Stories on a young lactose intolerant husky. WILL GIVE 300 GP per CH atleast 1.5 paragraph
info.description: Max is a young Husky that is lactose intolerant but loves dairy stuff. Follow Max through different points in his gassy poopy life and see where it takes him
